mapper.select: select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, m.name, r.pups_no, r.act_local_no from gms_recruit r inner join gms_memb m on r.memb_no=m.memb_no order by r.rcu_b_no desc
select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, m.name, r.pups_no, r.act_local_no from gms_recruit r inner join gms_memb m on r.memb_no=m.memb_no where r.rcu_b_no=#{no}
작성자 이름으로 조회 select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, r.act_local_no, r.pups_no, m.name from gms_recruit r left outer join gms_memb m on r.memb_no = m.memb_no where m.name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_recruit(title, content, act_local_no, pups_no, memb_no) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{actLocalNo}, #{purposeNo}, #{membNo} )
mapper.update: update gms_recruit set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, act_local_no = #{actLocalNo}, pups_no = #{purposeNo}, memb_no = #{membNo} where rcu_b_no = #{no}
update gms_recruit set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where rcu_b_no = #{no}
